name: Patricia M. WHITE, Petitioner v. SOUTHEASTERN PENNSYLVANIA TRANSPORTATION AUTHORITY, Respondent
name_abbreviation: White v. Southeastern Pennsylvania Transportation Authority

parties: Patricia M. WHITE, Petitioner v. SOUTHEASTERN PENNSYLVANIA TRANSPORTATION AUTHORITY, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 12th day of July, 2016, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue presented by petitioner and rephrased for clarity is whether expert opinion testimony and video evidence offered by a plaintiff to establish the extraordinary or unusual movement of a bus in a “jerk and jolt” case is sufficient to overcome a motion for nonsuit?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
141 A.3d 1237
Patricia M. WHITE, Petitioner v. SOUTHEASTERN PENNSYLVANIA TRANSPORTATION AUTHORITY, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 12, 2016.
